title: Good
text: Like this wrist monitor. Took it to the Dr and it calibrated just fine compared to Dr.‚Äôs arm monitor. Just wish it had a better Bluetooth connection to my iPhone 8+. It takes a while for them to connect with either mine or my wife‚Äôs phone. Frustrating and probably raises my blood pressure getting these two to sync. Also wish I could find online instructions. The booklet is so small that a person with glasses finds it hard to read.

title: Still loving my devices after years of using!
text: I have several Koogeek products, including the thermometer, blood pressure monitor and scale and although I have bought newer similar products, I find myself going back to my good ole‚Äô reliable Koogeek items for the ease of use, better features and peace of mind knowing that I am getting accurate readings. I honestly can‚Äôt think of any other brand of products or services that I haven‚Äôt been able to upgrade to something better after so many years of use, considering how fast technology is improving. I think Koogeek was years ahead of its time and is a brand I definitely want to stick with! ü•∞

title: Functional. But still needs improvements
text: After receiving the Koogeek S1 scale, I tracked my weight for over a week. While the app provides the functions advertised, it could still use some work. One improvement I would suggest is allowing the user to scale the trendline. Instead of spacing each measurement out equally, I think it would be better to space them out by time. This will allow for a better representation of weight gain/loss. Also, the organization of the functions is a little confusing. It took me a few minutes to understand where everything was located. Including a tutorial for first time users would be a great idea.

title: A lot of software issues needs to be resolved
text: Old comments of up to 5 years and the problems were never resolved‚Ä¶ Regretting believing in this product‚Ä¶ Automatic allocations of a persons weight to another person, and there is no way to change the user‚Ä¶ just can delete to whichever person it randomly assigned the weight to‚Ä¶ Always fails to connect to WiFi‚Ä¶ The only ok thing about all the 3 products (Weighing scale, BP & temp monitor) is that they work as a non smart product‚Ä¶ but thinking about the price spent for its smart connectivity features, makes it not worth it at all‚Ä¶ A lot more needs to be added and worked on‚Ä¶ Or will be filling for foreclosure soon‚Ä¶

title: Data does not write to Apple Health App
text: While the app works as described, it is unintuitive and badly designed. It is super confusing to navigate, not well organized. It works, it‚Äôs somewhat pleasant to look at, but using it is bullocks.  The app requested access to write to the Apple Health app although it never does. Been going back and forth with support and they have stated that it does not save data to the Apple Health app...then why in the heck does it ask for permission to write to it then. Please...PLEASE...PLEASE make this app write to the Apple Health app....it is the main reason I bought the scale, but it does not work....that way I could stop be confused by the nonsense of this app which requests that I look at an ad everyone I open it.....blah ...bleck

title: Nice app and device
text:
The design of the Koogeek blood pressure monitor is quite nice. The app is also well designed.
I keep having issues with signing in via Google sign in and not being able to. After allowing Koogeek access To my Google account and attempting to login, it takes you to the Google discovery homepage and will not log you in to your Googeek account in the app.

title: Sketchy privacy policy!
text: I have two blood pressure upper arm devices and find them not to be very accurate!  Difficult to connect them with my iPhone X on Bluetooth!

title: It‚Äôs a bum
text: Good scales are being trashed by an incompetent software programmers. It works together just 1 out of 5 times. There‚Äôs no proper profiles feature, no any privacy options, and the ‚Äúup to 16 users detection‚Äù thing is a lie! Sometimes it adds my wife‚Äôs measurements to my data, and we are not even close to be the same body type! Not going to buy any Koogeek products until you learn how to write a good software for it!

title: Losing A Fan
text: I was all in on the Koogeek tech until recently. Actually plan to swap all light bulbs, sockets and light switches to integrate my home. But lately the devices I‚Äôve purchased (blood pressure, & weight scale) have been working properly. The fact the the app all of sudden crashes and won‚Äôt allow me to even log in is the last straw! I am very disappointed.

title: Meh disappointing.
text: App‚Äôs FAQ won‚Äôt even load. I have thermometer and while it takes temperature  properly it won‚Äôt load that info onto app. I emailed the company asking if I‚Äôm not doing something right. No answer. Should‚Äôve bought some other thermometer.... if you are on the fence about buying anything from this company I say don‚Äôt do it.

title: Bluetooth connection
text: The Bluetooth connection keeps being disabled.  I‚Äôve tried everything and it does not work and if it works it work only momentary and it loses connection again.. totally frustrating!!

title: Poor Customer Service
text: After buying this product I had issues with it capturing weight and other indicators.  Tried numerous times to reach customer service but they never responded.  Recommend buying another product.

title: Steady improvements in the app
text:
The app has been improving over the last 6 months since I got the scale. 

Adds data to HealthKit 
Support multiple users

What still needs work: having the scale connect on the first reading.

title: Excellent.
text: It works well for me and does exactly what I need.

title: Reconnect Bluetooth
text: Every time I use it!

title: Poor Bluetooth conection
text: impossible to connect the scale with my iphone X. has been a disappointment because without the connection to the phone is a simple scale.

title: App crashes immediately
text: App crashes immediately rendering device useless.

title: Htifoni
text: There is a bug on the App, when I start the FG5 device along with App, the App icon shut off... Kindly fix the problem?

title: Need fixing
text: App crashes 2 seconds after launch. Can't use my massager. Pls fix!

title: Please fix the crashing.
text: Please fix the crashing...

title: Totally inaccurate measuring
text: When all others thermometers show 37.5, this one maximum showed 34.5!

title: Did not connect with my smart massager.
text: The app cannot connect with smart massager.

title: connection error
text: my new scales doesn‚Äôt connect to bluetooth or wifi at all. dunno is it the device or the app problem. really disappointed, will return it to seller. don‚Äôt buy this crappy stuff!

title: So so
text:
Scale looks good and connects fast if you use your phone bl. But if you want that this app would work over wifi scale, then it won't ! 

3h of trying to connect to Wifi my scale. And after that scale still doesn't work as it should.

App itself crashes a lot. Most of the time when you try to connect scale. 

Over all it's a nice looking app and good idea. But has a lot of bugs. 

As for today, don't waste your money. But maybe in few months they will fix these small bugs.

title: App does not work
text: App does not work in iPhone 7 Plus.

title: Massager
text: Worst setup ever. Can‚Äôt even find my device to add it.

title: Blood Pressure Monitor
text: My cardiologist insisted that I monitor my blood pressure. Rather than having to write it down every time I opted to purchase this product. So far I've had it for a day and has been working exactly as advertised.

title: This app is very good in life
text: It can help me to record the weight, record my exercise every day, the number of steps, weight loss, fitness, keep healthy, very beautiful

title: App needs work
text: Data export from my BP2 has date the readings were taken but not the time.  That limits the usefulness for my doctor because he can't tell the time of day which is important when dealing with morning hypertension.

title: Update crashes on iPad
text: This app no longer works on my iPad. It was working fine prior to this update.

title: Horrible
text: I have Iphone 6s. Bluetooth pairing does not work. The koogeek application crashes after you tap it to open. Im gonna return it.

title: Used to work
text: There is no support and I can no longer log onto the app.

title: App keeps crashing 10/30/18
text: Upon opening the app on iPhone 8 Plus, the app crashes.

title: New version of app stopped working with BP1
text: After the automatic update to the new version of the app, my existing BP1 will not connect. Before the update, it worked fine. I couldn't even use the built in issue reporting feature, since an error msg displayed every time I tried to send it.
